# NSURLAuthenticationMethodServerTrust

**Global Variable**

Perform server trust authentication (certificate validation) for this protection space.

## Declaration

```swift
let NSURLAuthenticationMethodServerTrust: String
```

## Discussion

This authentication method can apply to any protocol, and is most commonly used for overriding SSL and TLS chain validation.

To learn more, read [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/NetworkingInternet/Conceptual/NetworkingTopics/Articles/OverridingSSLChainValidationCorrectly.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40012544].

## Session-wide authentication challenges

- **NSURLAuthenticationMethodClientCertificate**: Use client certificate authentication for this protection space.
- **NSURLAuthenticationMethodNegotiate**: Negotiate whether to use Kerberos or NTLM authentication for this protection space.
- **NSURLAuthenticationMethodNTLM**: Use NTLM authentication for this protection space.
